str2: In like manner, likewise, just so. From hos and an adverb from autos; as thus, i.e. In the same way.
Properly, beautiful, but chiefly good, i.e. Valuable or virtuous.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
Manifest to all, evident, very clear. From pro and delos; plain before all men, i.e. Obvious.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Neuter Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Otherwise, things that are otherwise. Adverb from allos; differently.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
To hide, conceal, lay up. A primary verb; to conceal.
